last_episode_to_air.name: The Sound of One Hand Clapping
last_episode_to_air.overview: Molly goes undercover to trap a killer that is preying on homeless people at a campground. Meanwhile Lynn befriends a deaf man who might be a witness to the killings.

name: Sirens
overview: Sirens focused on the work and lives of three rookie female Pittsburgh Police officers. Officer Sarah Berkezchuk is dealing with her failing marriage, Officer Lynn Stanton is a single mom, and second-generation cop Officer Molly Whelan has a bad attitude which starts to interfere with her job. Each rookie officer worked under a veteran cop, and each grows and becomes more focused as a result.

episodes.name: PM Turn
episodes.overview: On the first shift, Lynn Stanton finds a parent whose missing TV is more important to her than her missing kids; Molly Whelan gets no slack from her partner; and Sarah Berkezchuk is bloodied by a brick thrower.

episodes.name: They Do It Standing Up
episodes.overview: Lynn deals with the heartbreak of notifying a dead man's next-of-kin, while a basketball player falls in love with Molly when she insists on playing basketball with them.

episodes.name: Jumper
episodes.overview: A man threatening to jump from a bridge will only let rookie officer Berkezchuk on the ledge with him to talk him down.

episodes.name: Everybody Lies
episodes.overview: Whelan has to appear in court to testify against a woman who assaulted her but things don't go planned. Meanwhile the Berkezchuks argue over money issues.

episodes.name: Holy Deadlock
episodes.overview: Whelan has a date with a weatherman while Berkezchuk thinks there is something odd about her husband's attempts to reconcile.

episodes.name: What We Talk About When We Talk About Love
episodes.overview: A battered wife hesitates to press charges, but her lawyer husband has no qualms doing so. Whelan doesn't want her new boyfriend to find out she is a cop. Later she finds out he has a secret of his own.

episodes.name: Strike Two
episodes.overview: Berkezchuk moves in with Stanton who has been accused of using excessive force and faces a hearing.

episodes.name: Guy Perfect
episodes.overview: Stanton starts to resent Whelan while Schiller gives Sarah some good advice on handling Kelly who has just gotten the results of his sergeant's examination.

episodes.name: Looks Like Christmas
episodes.overview: The Christmas spirit fills the station, but out on the streets it is business as usual. Christmas festivities include an unamused drug dealer, children who have to deal with their mother's suicide attempt, Whelan's fruitcake and a drunk driver who thinks he is George Baily from "It's A Wonder Life."

episodes.name: Gal Cops
episodes.overview: A television crew for a reality show called "Gal Cops" follows the female officers in the precinct for the day.

episodes.name: Waterloo
episodes.overview: Schiller is stabbed due to Molly's inattention while the Berkezchuk household continues to have more problems.

episodes.name: Keeping the Peace
episodes.overview: Stanton becomes deeply concerned about deadly force after she pulls her gun on a group of juveniles. Whelan tries to learn more about her partner Schiller.

episodes.name: They'll Get You in the End
episodes.overview: Stanton takes an unusual bus ride when her car stops working. Whalen tries to figure out why Schiller is so on edge on this particular day.

episodes.name: Gun Play (1)
episodes.overview: Jessie has to deal with the murder of her husband. When guns are stolen from the property room she realizes that the two crimes may be linked to it.

episodes.name: Crossing the Line
episodes.overview: Stanton shoots a young suspect in self-defense and is stalked by the dead girl's friend. Meanwhile Jessie finds an abandoned baby in the car and becomes attached to him.

episodes.name: Farewell to Arms
episodes.overview: Lynn and Amy attempt to keep order in a neighborhood that is torn by feuding Serbians and Croatians. Meanwhile Molly must deal with her grandfather's mental breakdown.

episodes.name: A Cop First
episodes.overview: Molly is talked into becoming a phone sex operator to catch a serial killer. Meanwhile Jessie interrogates an informer who might know something about the councilman who was shot dead in a car in the park.

episodes.name: Chasing a Ghost
episodes.overview: Molly and her training officer have to transport a insane murder suspect and Lynn must handle an old con-man. Meanwhile Jessie decides to go on a talk show.

episodes.name: The Needle and the Damage Done
episodes.overview: Lynn is stabbed with a drug addict's used needle while attempting to arrest him. Meanwhile Jessie investigates a man who claims he fired the shot that killed John F. Kennedy.

episodes.name: The First Time
episodes.overview: Molly's dream day off turns into a nightmare when she becomes a hostage in a coffee shop. Amy and Lynn are accused of using excess violence in arresting a traffic violator.

episodes.name: Guns, Bombs and Fantasies
episodes.overview: Jessie gives a talk at her old high school where a student is shot. This event exposes a secret club in the school. Meanwhile back at the station a mad bomber makes life more difficult for the officers.

episodes.name: Family Secrets
episodes.overview: Molly is in a quandary when she accidentally learns that a fellow officer was involved with a murder victim. Jessie and Dan investigate a possible child abuse case.

episodes.name: Victims
episodes.overview: Lynn reaches out to a teenage girl who witnessed a murder but reluctant to testify. Richie and Molly try to stop an extortionist. Stiles goes after a gangbanger.

episodes.name: Missing
episodes.overview: Richie is missing and Molly is frantic. Jessie is assigned to work with the FBI. When she becomes close to agent Jack, Dan gets jealous.

episodes.name: The Witness
episodes.overview: Molly and Lynn have to put their vacation on hold when they are assigned to protect a hostile socialite witness.

episodes.name: Angel Falling
episodes.overview: Detective Springer is partnered with his former training officer during a drug investigation. Lynn and Amy are assigned to protect a rapist who has served his time and has just be released from prison.

episodes.name: Gambling on Love
episodes.overview: Molly discovers that her new boyfriend is a gambler whose debts are mounting and could possibly be connected to a recent murder.

episodes.name: The Abduction
episodes.overview: Buddy and Dan are abducted by a group of desperate robbers and taken to an abandoned warehouse unknown to their fellow officers.

episodes.name: The Aftermath
episodes.overview: The investigation into the beating death of a family man uncovers a connection between the mob and the dead man's brother. Lynn has problems mourning Buddy's death while Amy is promoted into his old position.

episodes.name: Redemption
episodes.overview: While stopping a fight between two gangs, Lynn discovers that her cousin's son is a gang member. The parish priest thinks he can cool off the gangs, but discovers it is not that easy.

episodes.name: The Passenger
episodes.overview: The serial murders of several cab drivers causes Springer to call in a psychologist to make a profile and he acts as bait with Molly and Rich. Meanwhile back at the station, all the cops are freezing when the heating system fails.

episodes.name: The Obsession
episodes.overview: Jessie begins dating a doctor she saved during a robbery, but when she decides to break it off, he becomes obsessed and begins stalking her.

episodes.name: Color Blind
episodes.overview: Molly investigates a car that has plunged into the river. Lynn becomes involved in a racially charged case and becomes the subject of a reporter's TV profile.

episodes.name: The Sound of One Hand Clapping
episodes.overview: Molly goes undercover to trap a killer that is preying on homeless people at a campground. Meanwhile Lynn befriends a deaf man who might be a witness to the killings.
